Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.name: init(network:service:storage:networkHandler:dispatchQueue:)
Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.abstract: Use this initializer to specify your custom environment.

Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.name: mainNet(accountCreationApi:whitelistingApi:)
Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.abstract: A convinence function to get a default setup of the main net environment.

Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.name: testNet()
Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.abstract: A convinence function to get a default setup of the test environment.

Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.name: allAccountIds()
Structs/KinEnvironment.html#/s:7KinBase0.abstract: A convinence function to get all account ids stored in the current environment.

Protocols/KinPaymentWriteOperations.html.name: sendKinPayment(_:memo:)
Protocols/KinPaymentWriteOperations.html.abstract: Send a paymentItem to the Kin Blockchain for processing.

Protocols/KinPaymentWriteOperations.html.name: sendKinPayments(_:memo:)
Protocols/KinPaymentWriteOperations.html.abstract: Sends a batch of payments, each corresponding to KinPaymentItem in a single KinTransaction to be processed together.

Protocols/KinPaymentReadOperations.html#.name: observePayments(mode:)
Protocols/KinPaymentReadOperations.html#.abstract: Retrieves the last N KinPayments sent or received by the account and listens for future payments over time.

Protocols/KinPaymentReadOperations.html#.name: getPaymentsForTransactionHash(_:)
Protocols/KinPaymentReadOperations.html#.abstract: Retrieves the KinPayments that were processed in the referred KinTransaction

Protocols/KinAccountReadOperations.html#.name: observeBalance(mode:)
Protocols/KinAccountReadOperations.html#.abstract: Returns the current balance and listens to future account balance changes.

Protocols/KinAccountCreationApi.html.name: KinAccountCreationApi
Protocols/KinAccountCreationApi.html.abstract: An API for the SDK to delegate KinAccount registration with the Kin Blockchain to developers.

Protocols/KinTransactionWhitelistingApi..name: KinTransactionWhitelistingApi
Protocols/KinTransactionWhitelistingApi..abstract: An API for the SDK to delegate transaction whitelisting with the Kin Blockchain to developers.

Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.name: passive
Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.abstract: Updates are only based on local actions or via calling Observer.requestInvalidation

Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.name: active
Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.abstract: Updates are pushed from the network. Includes all .passive updates.

Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.name: activeNewOnly
Enums/ObservationMode.html#/s:7KinBase15.abstract: Exclusively new updates from actions taken after starting to listen to this Observer.

Enums/ObservationMode.html.name: ObservationMode
Enums/ObservationMode.html.abstract: Describes the mode by which updates are presented to an Observer

Classes/DefaultHorizonKinTransactionWhit.name: whitelistTransaction(request:completion:)
Classes/DefaultHorizonKinTransactionWhit.abstract: Developers are expected to call their back-end’s to whitelist a transaction.

Classes/DefaultHorizonKinAccountCreation.name: createAccount(request:completion:)
Classes/DefaultHorizonKinAccountCreation.abstract: Developers are expected to call their back-end’s to register

Classes/KinService/Errors.html#/s:7KinBa.name: upgradeRequired
Classes/KinService/Errors.html#/s:7KinBa.abstract: It is expected that this error is handled gracefully by notifying users

Classes/KinAccount.html#/s:7KinBase0A7Ac.name: sequence
Classes/KinAccount.html#/s:7KinBase0A7Ac.abstract: The sequence number on a registered account

Classes/KinAccount.html#/s:7KinBase0A7Ac.name: merge(_:)
Classes/KinAccount.html#/s:7KinBase0A7Ac.abstract: Merges self.key with other info on the given account

Classes/KinAccountContext/Builder.html#/.name: importExistingPrivateKey(_:)
Classes/KinAccountContext/Builder.html#/.abstract: Let’s you access the KinAccount from a private key

Classes/KinAccountContext/Builder.html.name: Builder
Classes/KinAccountContext/Builder.html.abstract: Provides different ways to build a KinAccountContext. Initialize the Builder with a KinEnvironment to start.

Classes/KinAccountContext.html#/s:7KinBa.name: service
Classes/KinAccountContext.html#/s:7KinBa.abstract: A service used to retrieve all account and payment data

Classes/KinAccountContext.html#/s:7KinBa.name: storage
Classes/KinAccountContext.html#/s:7KinBa.abstract: Stores all account and payment data. See KinFileStorage for provided implementation.

Classes/KinAccountContext.html.name: KinAccountContext
Classes/KinAccountContext.html.abstract: Instantiate a KinAccountContext to operate on a KinAccount when you have a private key.

Classes/NetworkOperationHandler.html.name: NetworkOperationHandler
Classes/NetworkOperationHandler.html.abstract: Handles queuing, retry, and backoff strategy of network operations.

Classes.html#/s:7KinBase15StellarSdkProx.name: StellarSdkProxy
Classes.html#/s:7KinBase15StellarSdkProx.abstract: A proxy layer for StellarSDK to make testing easier, as classes in StellarSDK are not open for overrides.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
